Derek can introduce you to 10 people at Google
Some entrepreneurs fail because they take on big projects they're unable to handle. My advice: take affordable steps. #PowerOfBroke

Set vision and direction for international movement to restore creativity to the world of work while reconnecting individuals to their local community. Investor in early stage startups. Speak around the world on innovation, creativity and economic development. Inducted as initial Arizona Tech Titan in 2013 with Craig Barrett, Jim Armstrong, Pat Sullivan and others. Manage relationships and programs with Mayors, Council Members, Legislators and Provosts at many cities, states and universities.  Run global operations of facilities in multiple countries.

Responsible for coaching management teams at GoDaddy, Intel and Pearson through culture transformations around product development and software delivery.  Mentored software development managers and product managers on agile software delivery processes, techniques and principles.  Trained teams on agile methodologies and principles while coaching through practical implementation.  Worked with $100+ million product lines to turn around products and teams.  Responsible for creating product strategies and architecting initial implementations to obtain funding for new product lines in portfolio for web 1.0 companies like Orbitz and Monster.Primary duties included building high performing teams and putting strategy in place for them to execute against while growing the leaders of the organization to maintain them.
Taught Entrepreneurship in Digital Media to seniors and graduate students at the Cronkite School ofJournalism. Focused on Lean StartUp principles and exposing an entrepreneurial spirit in students.
Mobile device consulting company. Built applications for iOS, Android and Microsoft mobile platforms.  Acquired by Integrum Technologies.
Senior consultant to deputy county administrator. Implemented managing for results initiative and lead business intelligence/budget predictive systems for $2.6 billion 16,000+ employee organization.
Developed system for personal trainers to monitor high performance athletes using mobile devices.
Developed legal practice management software for large legal firms.

Delivered loan document processing system and first digital document delivery system for mortgage industry from lenders to title companies using public internet. Including Bank of America, Chase, PNC and Countrywide.
Sit on board as fund raising/event chair for dynamic social services non-profit focused on feeding the hungry, housing homeless, taking care of the elderly and providing basic life services.

recommendations: Shauna Fields
Experienced Content Strategist and Project Manager
August 31, 2016, Shauna worked with Derek but at different companies

This recommendation is about 6 years overdue but Derek has added immeasurably to my life by his past work in building Gangplank. It came into my life just when I need it most. I met amazing people there, many of whom I still consider friends, and the expertise and passion I was exposed to has helped me pivot my career in recent years, better identify organizations and people who are worth working with and investing in, and develop the grit needed to maintain innovative thinking and habits in a very inflexible business world. It's also ingrained in me a deep appreciation for serendipity in both personal and professional endeavors. Thank you, Derek!

December 15, 2011, Derek worked with Jeremie in the same group

Gangplank will be in the history books as a benchmark for change. The vision that Derek fostered has brought together more visionaries in one place than nearly any org I have read of. Gangplank is the Bill of Rights equivalent to how business can be done. Living up to the ideals remains far more challenging than the words themselves, although, with people like Derek driving the purpose behind them, I consider myself more than fortunate. Beyond this, Derek is endlessly curious and continually reading and studying the boundaries of the future. You will do well by your business and culture to bring Derek in.2010 will always be a watershed year fro me, as my time in Gangplank has more than tripled both my business and network. Furthermore, I am amazed at who I have become as a result of the people I now work alongside and collaborate with!

summary: Technical leader with a track record of bringing product to market, helping grow talent and get results.  Managed teams and organizations of all sizes. Helped prepare companies to scale in preparation for exit/IPO multiple times.  Seasoned at helping organizations make organizational and cultural change to optimize for growth.Twenty years of executive coaching, technical management, software development and product ownership experience working with multiple organizations, technologies and methodologies. Ability to understand and observe complex systems and decompose them for improvement.Specialties: Leadership, Building High Performance Teams, Employee Engagement & Development, Agile Software Development (SCRUM, XP, Kanban), Product Design/Management/Strategy and Business DevelopmentPrevious Roles:Chief Technology Officer, VP of Engineering, Agile Coach, Director of Product, Product Manager, Angel Investor, Entrepreneur
